events.name: “There is Something Very Different Going on Here”: Archaeologists Keep Finding Gigantic Shoes at This 2000-Year-Old Roman Site
events.description: A recent excavation at the ancient Roman site of Maiden Castle in England has uncovered a remarkable discovery: gigantic shoes estimated to be over 10 feet tall and weighing an astonishing 2 tons. According to eyewitnesses, the massive footwear was uncovered during recent excavations. While some have questioned the validity of the find, others remain intrigued by the sheer scale and potential significance of this discovery. Further investigation is needed to uncover the truth behind these enigmatic artifacts.

events.name: Orange disk over Antelope Park, Utah July 3, 2025 UFO UAP sighting news. Over the Salt Lake. 👽👀😱
events.description: A recent UFO sighting over Antelope Park, Utah, on July 3, 2025, remains shrouded in mystery. The witness, a self-proclaimed avid sky watcher, captured footage of an orange-glowing object behind dark clouds, which appears to have formed a spiral cloud with F-35 fighter jets. While the sighting is intriguing, its verifiability and potential explanations remain unexplained. Witnesses report that the UFO was over 100 meters in diameter and moved rapidly. Despite efforts to verify the footage through official channels, no conclusive evidence has been found. This case continues to spark curiosity and debate, with some questioning the authenticity of the recording and others speculating about military or extraterrestrial involvement.
